website_summaries.verdict: You might like this model's unique capabilities; otherwise, consider others on our shortlist.
pros: Disassembles easily for cleaning and sharpening
cons: The shears are on the higher end of the price spectrum, and the handles are small

customer_reviews.title: NOT GERMAN - Chinese Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I, like many of you, like Wusthof and an willing to pay more when they're made in Germany (there are plenty of Chinese shears for less than half price here on Amazon." I read the questions where people asked if they are German. Some said yes, some said no, the item description says (twice) they are German. Well, let me clarify, definitively the a sweet. MADE IN CHINA (see the bottom left of my attached picture). BS misleading item description.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Zumaeta

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased these shears. I thought the people that said they come apart too easily were being a little picky. I was definitely wrong. These come apart way too easily. In fact, they don't just annoy me now I'm afraid of them. I went to use them yesterday to cut some tape and they fell apart and the tip stabbed my finger and sliced it open. They are extremely sharp I'll give them that. Terrible purchase that I regret.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly uncomfortable! NOT Ergonomic, handles are NOT what was shown on Amazon web site.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly uncomfortable! Handles are NOT what was shown on Amazon web site. Holes on the handle are sized for a child NOT an adult. Wusthof is a fine brand but these are NOT MADE IN GERMANY, there Chines knock offs. I definitely do NOT recommend anyone buying these scissors Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: TvD

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer could solve this problem easily by using a metal screw
customer_reviews.text: Only problem with this product is that after awhile the plastic thingie holding them together breaks, and cannot be repaired. The manufacturer could solve this problem easily by using a metal screw.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wüsthof cuts the competition!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a kitchen knife and opted for this one based on the great reviews - and I don't regret. It's solid, sturdy, doesn't feel cheap, feels great in my hands, great weight balance, meaning, it's not super light or too heavy, and it's very reliably sharp. It's also super easy to clean once you twist it open to 90 degrees, and can clean each section individually. For anyone that states that this scissors come apart too easily, I can't imagine what you're doing to have this happen - never even got close to coming apart unless if I wanted to. Great product, great price, great purchase, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Oldenburg

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, strong and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: No kitchen should be without a pair of these!! Or maybe even 4 pairs!! Ha ha.. Seriously though we use these for almost everything. Our favourite uses are: cutting raw pork ribs into more manageable sizes for our pots (love to slow cook them!); chopping up our little ones food before serving; and cutting herbs directly into our recipes. They are super sharp and strong! I love that they come apart for easy cleaning in the dishwasher. More importantly the rubber hasn't yet begun to disintegrate years later unlike another pair we once had... I can't stand the sticky feeling plastic gets when it gets old!
customer_reviews.author: Scarletrose

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Everything Scissor
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are my favorite to do everything!!! They cut paper, cardboard shipping boxes like razor, anything except metal. Because they come apart I can run a sharpener over them. But the reason I keep ordering them is the ways they save kitchen time. I use then to cut whole chickens, lettuce for salads. I hated cutting chicken wings, these make it fun. The bonus really is the price!
customer_reviews.author: Teenie

customer_reviews.title: These are great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: These are great kitchen shears. They come apart and go back together easily. They do not come apart easily during normal use. Taking them apart makes it very easy to properly clean them as needed and keep them in good working order. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Indispensible
customer_reviews.text: These are the only, designed for kitchen use, shears that I have ever owned. I purchased them over three years ago, and don't know how I ever managed without them. They can be used for every kitchen shearing job, and come apart easily for cleaning. In addition, they double as a small (1.5") bottle opener. I like them so much that I got a pair for each of my stepchildren. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Condie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kitchen Scissors
customer_reviews.text: I like be these scissors! They are sharp enough and heavy enough to use for opening a blister pack. The pull apart function makes them easy to clean after opening a package of meat. They can be thrown in the dishwasher. I use these almost every time I am in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, NOT Germany!
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon product description states “Made in Solingen, Germany”. But when I received the product, the package says “Made in China”. This is misleading advertising, and the description should be changed.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shears!!
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! They are very sharp and cut just about anything. We had another pair of expensive shears, but they could not even cut paper with a clean edge. I was impressed with the quality--especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pick

customer_reviews.title: One star is too high a rating
customer_reviews.text: Wretched shears. They are far too dull to be useful. They cannot be used to break down a chicken, etc.. And the blades cannot be sharpened! Also, the handle design is lousy & painfully cuts into hands. To top it off they often come apart while being used. Dangerous and useless! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these scissors! Wish I had 3 more pair of them
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these scissors! Wish I had 3 more pair of them...and you very well may also once you use a pair. I like everything about them: – the fact they come apart so easily and can go right in the dishwasher if (like me) you happen to like kitchen-scissors – they cut very, very well and consistently – they are comfortable for a woman with not really very large hands to handle well – the price for the quality is very fair – thoughtfully designed and made The only thing I don't like is I don't yet have an extra pair for the garage and at least 1-2 other rooms in the house/office.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I cook every night and these scissors are therefore used at least once a day if not more often. We replaced another pair that had finally worn out after a decade of use. These are even better because the come apart for easy cleaning. They're extremely sharp, the handles are comfortable, and they're easy to use. We have a heavier pair for cutting poultry, but these are ideal for chives, kitchen twine, and opening shrink-wrapped foods.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice scissors for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love Wusthof cutlery, and my old kitchen scissors were old and needed to be replaced, so I got these. They certainly aren't Wusthof's best, but I figured they be better than what I had before, and they are. They feel kinda flimsy compared to Wusthof's better scissors but they get the job done. Blades are sharp, they feel good in my hand and also feel decently constructed. Even though they are come apart scissors, they haven't come apart except when I've wanted them to (no separating at inconvenient times) and the bottle/cap opener is very handy. They feel well constructed and well put together and it seems (so far) they will outlast the 20+ years my old ones did.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots
customer_reviews.text: Im a little disappointed. My pervious pair was fantastic and lasted years. But were lost in a move. I ordered a new pair. The stainless steel have a tendency to rust. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pnmamouf

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and handy
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how people who are using these shears to have an issue with them coming apart. Perhaps they are using them like hedge trimmers, which would indeed, open them all the way. After trimming off chicken fat, etc, you really want to be able to quickly take them apart and clean them, otherwise bacteria will accumulate around the pivot. This is my second pair...a dog chewed the handle up on the first pair, and using duct tape as a repair kinda defeated the benefits of the shear.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked the low price tag, the fact that it comes apart for easy cleaning, and they cut very nicely. I can't stand having fat or gristle on my meat so I mostly use these to cut it off of my meat before cooking. I haven't used a ton of scissors in the past but these are definitely the best pair I've had in my kitchen. 100% would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner morse

customer_reviews.title: Despite using Stainless Steel you will find it will rust after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 15 months now and it's definitely starting to rust. It comes apart easily, sure, but not in your hands while cutting. I find that, if it weren't advertised for being stainless high carbon and then clearly rusting after this time, I'd otherwise be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Prince

customer_reviews.title: These become dangerous in time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these just over 3 years ago, and in that time, the come-apart aspect of the shears has become its most critical aspect. You see, these shears simply will not stay together. They come apart if you look at them sideways. Tonight, they came apart in my husband's hands, and nearly impaled his foot. Genuinely not safe as they age.
customer_reviews.author: Nunna U Bizniz

customer_reviews.title: Well done.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product a few days ago and it arrived today. The packaging was flawless and the scissors are sharp, sturdy, well designed, and well worth the price. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scissors for the kitchen. Nice pointed tips. Light and easy to handle. Come apart for cleaning. JUST REMEMBER to dry them immediately after washing to avoid rust.
customer_reviews.author: C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: With Wusthoff shears, cutting is a treat.
customer_reviews.text: Ever cut up a whole chicken? Without theses German shears, it's a matter for a cutlery school. Wusthoff shears dispatch a chicken in a few snips. Cut out the backbone from the tail and the rest is easy. You're going to find that they come apart to be cleaned like knives.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K Evans

customer_reviews.title: just awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older pair of Anolon brand kitchen shears and they did not disappoint! I love the feature of them easily coming apart for cleaning. These shears are the best!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Rust one time wash
customer_reviews.text: Washed one time. Already rusted. Made in China of course.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift. I already own one. I use my Westoff to cot up chickens. I love the product so bought one for my son. It was delivered 3 days,after the order. I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: patricia C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen shears I've owned. Tough and they come very sharp. Use for any food prep and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen scissors/shears I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp! Easy to clean; they just pop apart and are dishwasher safe. Every cook needs a pair of these in the sharps drawer. Reasonable price, too.
customer_reviews.author: James-Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must-have
customer_reviews.text: Ours disappeared from our block and my husband inadvertently bought some from a different cutlery brand instead. Nothing beats the take-apart design to clean them thoroughly. It's one of those things that you don't think are that important until they go missing and you realize how much you use them. They are strong with a good blade for cutting anything (except bones of course). I anticipate having them for years to come, as long as they don't go missing again.
customer_reviews.author: K Kennaugh

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they changed the design...
customer_reviews.text: They changed the design a bit so that the black cover (round nub) where the scissors pair up is thicker than my original pair so it doesn't fit into my Wushof knife block. Otherwise they look good and work good but its annoying that it doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Twiz

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid fell. Blades are sharp and cut well. Nice, padded grips.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Penny

customer_reviews.title: Sheerly Great Shears
customer_reviews.text: These shears cut and clean up like a charm. They go together, and come apart with ease. When I'm done cutting up large green leaves for my health smoothies I just separate the blades and place in dishwasher, to be rinsed when I have a big enough load. I don't, however, run through a full machine wash and dry, due to the possible damage to the handles from my machine's high drying temperature. These are the best kitchen shears I've ever had, and I've had some quite expensive ones, that just don't hold a soy candle to these.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Prendys

customer_reviews.title: Very Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cutters and hope to have them last for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: canjoe1

customer_reviews.title: Execllent Kitchen Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value for the money! Very sharp, heavy duty feel and easy to break down for thorough cleaning. Only wish the finger holes were bigger, and I have medium/large hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Moreton

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any kitchen. And with a name like Wusthof, it has to be good. The blades are really sharp. One thing though: be careful when you use it, because if you open it all the way (using both hands), the two pieces will separate (by design). This is for proper cleaning I assume, which I appreciate. However, I wasn't expecting it and I wasn't paying attention and dropped one of the pieces. If I did hurt myself, it would've been 100% my fault, but luckily I didn't. Anyway, great shears, purchase with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: These scissors work great. I use them for everything from cutting paper ...
customer_reviews.text: These scissors work great. I use them for everything from cutting paper to cutting the backs out of chickens for spatchcock roasting. They also take and hold a very sharp (shaving sharp) edge very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle B.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves that these shears come apart because they are super simple to clean. Me? I am not a huge fan. Sometimes I open the scissors wide to open a package and they fall apart on me, clattering to the floor in a dangerous way. Still, they are sharp and honestly I probably shouldn't be trying to use these as I am and the ease of cleaning makes up for the sometimes-dangerous situation I put myself in.
customer_reviews.author: dahanese

customer_reviews.title: nice weight, sharp.
customer_reviews.text: The kitchen scissors from my set of Wustof knives came up missing so I wanted to replace them with a pair that would fit into the wood block. Fits perfectly and I'm happy with the scissors.
customer_reviews.author: irishLRose

customer_reviews.title: Best I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've owned OXO, Kitchen Aid and Rachael Ray and these Wusthofs are by far much better. The others suffered from being loose and not having enough tension between the blades resulting in difficulty cutting thin objects. The Wusthofs fit is just right in my large hands. I haven't had any problem with them coming apart while cutting as another poster stated. They have a feel of precision. I'd wouldn't hesitate recommending them
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pair of scissors
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautifully made scissors with take apart feature for easy cleaning. This is an excellent pair of scissors
customer_reviews.author: Julie F.

customer_reviews.title: Truly a fabulous set of shears - Don't wait, buy!
customer_reviews.text: Yet another awesome product I found off the amazon best sellers list from reddit. Amazingly easy to clean, and most importantly, extremely sharp! Quickly cuts through meats, plastics, and more. The hinge is extremely well designed, simply pull the shears greater than 90 degrees and they come apart easily! No lube needed, just wash and reattach. An EXCELLENT product, I highly recommend picking up a pair if you don't have good shears!
customer_reviews.author: Justin T

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know if I would like the come apart feature of these scissors; I was afraid they wouldn't be sturdy when using or if I opened too wide during cutting they would come apart on me. My fears were unfounded, they are very sturdy and stay together unless you deliberately open them all the way. I should have known it wouldn't be an issue, my Wusthof knives are amazing. These scissors are very sharp and work great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality and sharp. Has a good weight to it unlike cheaper kitchen shears.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: I recently replaced another kitchen shears that I had with ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced another kitchen shears that I had with this Wustof kitchen shear. The other (no name brand) did not come apart to wash. I am a complete germ phobe, so I was always concerned the kitchen shear wasn't getting clean enough. Problem solved when the whole thing comes apart! Thank you Wustof!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flossie2000

customer_reviews.title: I’m in kitchen shears heaven
customer_reviews.text: It’s wusthof, what more is there to say? Shears are sharp, strong, easy to clean, if you keep them out of the dishwasher should last a long time. The BEST part is they come in a package that doesn’t REQUIRE kitchen shears/strong scissors to open. Super thoughtful and appreciated considering my old pair was rusted shut. Great purchase for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen shears are sharp, strong, well made and come apart for cleaning. I’ll be using them for light jobs in the kitchen so I know they will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Twice As Nice

customer_reviews.title: Truly Excellent Scissors (Okay, fine - "Shears")
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality shears, and very easy to clean because the blades can be separated from each other. We keep them in a drawer in the kitchen and usually just pull them out when something needs a quick snip. As silly as this sounds, I use other (cheaper) scissors more often because these are "the good ones" and I don't want to mess them up cutting just anything. Zero complaints, and a worthwhile purchase. They would make an excellent gift as well. (I gave them to my wife a couple years ago, and she was happy with them.)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A. Mastro

customer_reviews.title: love these things
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily to open food packaging. The come-apart feature makes them easy to clean when they get wet or greasy, which happens pretty often. They're machine washable, very durable, and have the best ergonomics of any shears I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: e^pi*i+1=0

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for money
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as nice as the shears that came with my Wustoff knife set, but much better quality than the run of the mill brands you will find in your local stores. A good deal for the price. I used these kitchen shears to prepare my dogs raw dog food and it cuts well through large cuts of meats, chicken bones, beef hearts and duck necks.
customer_reviews.author: onefreespirit427

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded best shears ever
customer_reviews.text: These shears were the replacement of a pair I had purchased in Germany. Over a ten year period, the ones I had lost their edge and somehow got bent (I don't know how that happened). I love that I can separate them and put them in the dishwasher. These newer models have a more comfortable, fatter handle. Overall, a great set of kitchen scissor, and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Blankeetah

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: An excellent utensil. This is a replacement for one that melted in the dishwasher (my fault). It gave me several years of good service, loved that I could take it apart for cleaning. It is strong enough for chicken bones, and makes it easy to trim fat off meat. I didn't hesitate to buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: barbaraje

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: Love these shears. Gave my prior pair to my daughter. They came in a knife block I gave her. I missed them right away. Purchased these the next day. Exact match. You can clean them well, and if history repeats, they will last decades. Never any rust.
customer_reviews.author: gulf2golf

customer_reviews.title: Been Need'n These!
customer_reviews.text: I have been needing shears like this for quite some time. It was not until I decided that I would buy whole chickens and "break them down" myself to save a little money. These shears cut right through the ribs. In fact they were great going through the breast bone. Plus, they come apart and my husband can sharpen them as need be!
customer_reviews.author: S. Alberts

customer_reviews.title: Super upset that these no longer have the half-moon 'bone' ...
customer_reviews.text: Super upset that these no longer have the half-moon 'bone' cutout. I tried splitting a chicken and it's much more difficult. I bought a pair of these a few years ago and loved them, but will now try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: but it is so worth it to have a good one like this as well as owning a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, they are Wusthof, so need I say more. We all probably have multiple sets of scissors around, but it is so worth it to have a good one like this as well as owning a good pair of scissors specifically for fabric or cloth. Bought them as part of an engagement gift and purchased a set for myself at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: ipka54

customer_reviews.title: Great designand great price
customer_reviews.text: I like these, they are nice and sharp but like a lot of kitchen shears, they do not accommodate a large hand with big fingers very well. I like the fact that I can pull apart the blades and clean them thoroughly. It will also make sharpening the blades much easier. Well-designed and that a great price.
customer_reviews.author: A. O. Reason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Like someone else has noted, they DO come apart easily if you open them to their widest. I've used these a fair amount now though and I don't open them on accident very often. I do have large hands so that was a concern for me. They're incredibly sharp and have held up well for all of my home cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these shears for a couple of years now and also bought a pair for a friend after an unfortunate episode trying to butterfly a duck with a dull filet knife. They're essential for any kitchen, in my opinion - sturdy, reliable, easy to clean, and super useful. I especially like the screw-top opener feature on the handles; metal teeth that you can clamp around a stubborn screw top to ease it open. You won't regret buying these!
customer_reviews.author: slooow loris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HIGH QUALITY PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME HEAVY DUTY HIGH QUALITY GERMAN KITCHEN SHEARS!!!! YOU WILL NEVER USE JUNK STORE BOUGHT SHEARS AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: "Cleanable" scissors
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Wusthof for years and gift it to friends. The best part is that you can separate them and put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Marie NYC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really great shears. I love that they come apart for cleaning. I haven't run into much that they can't handle so far... except for preventing people from using them for non-cooking tasks.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Overgaard

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart easy, but not too easy
customer_reviews.text: Good scissors. Easily comes apart for easy cleaning. But seldom comes apart by accident. Nice tight feel, but not too tight. So far holds up fine to dishwasher. Not left or right hand specific, which is good in a mixed hand preference household. Not the most comfortable grip, how long do you have to grip this? Made in Germany.
customer_reviews.author: Conflicted Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any household
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shears out there! This will be our third pair and is for our camp trailer. We have had our other pairs for a couple of years and they are still sharp and tight and work great on everything from paper to chicken. Remember to dry them before putting them back together and they will last years.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna be a Tropical Girl

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart for easy cleaning and a few swipes through the Wusthof sharpener ...
customer_reviews.text: Use these almost daily and they never let me down. Comes apart for easy cleaning and a few swipes through the Wusthof sharpener keeps it sharp. Like them so much, we have them in the workshop, kitchen, garage and bar. Great price for a real workhorse item!
customer_reviews.author: Spa Mama

customer_reviews.title: Identical to original shears
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace broken shears. Works exactly the same. Fits well in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C

customer_reviews.title: Wusthoff Come-Apart Kitchen Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Love Wusthoff cutlery (use their knives all the time for kitchen prep), and these scissors have the typical Wusthoff quality. Very sharp cutting edges on the blades and come apart easily to wash/sanitize - especially important after cutting/trimming raw meats. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: 927lmm

customer_reviews.title: I COULD NOT BE WITHOUT THESE SCISSORS!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of theses shears. I had the last pair for seven, yes, SEVEN years! They are wonderful in the kitchen, for crafts, opening packages, etc... One you have owned a pair, you cannot be without them!
customer_reviews.author: Girly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Style and quality seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am super hard on shears so I decided on a higher quality pair then normal. I am anxious to try and update on my findings.....they seem to fit the hand well and I love the idea of them coming apart for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: harley gal

customer_reviews.title: Best Kitchen Shears I've Had
customer_reviews.text: Stays sharp, easy to clean. Should have purchased these years ago as I love my Wusthof knives.
customer_reviews.author: Otter Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Actually works for a lefty.
customer_reviews.text: The old set of kitchen shears I had never worked that well for me, at the end I had to try and cut things right handed just to get them to sort of work. These work great, even cutting things like foil or paper. There are solid and look to be well constructed. They come apart easily and are are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: notnecessary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, works equally well for right or left handers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, who is left handed, to use in the kitchen for cutting chicken, etc. They work equally well for right handers as well. The come-apart design makes them easy to clean. They have held up well after over a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Chip White

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: Wusthof is a fantastic company for cutlery. This is another pair after misplacing the first. Unsure if I like how these shears come apart. The first time, my wife thought she broken them.
customer_reviews.author: Making things simple

customer_reviews.title: You can separate and clean these, which can't be ...
customer_reviews.text: You can separate and clean these, which can't be done with most shears. The are machined well to give a powerful clean cut.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors
customer_reviews.text: Not only great food scissors but, surprisingly, it can with a matching, Wushtof pastry/cheese/paté spreader, which was not mentioned in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: I love that they come apart but it hurts my hand ...
customer_reviews.text: The shears cut well but they are very uncomfortable to use. I love that they come apart but it hurts my hand to use them. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: J. Min

customer_reviews.title: Efficient Discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: These shears are 'sharp'! Which is why I give it 4 stars. The con is the handle is not completely ergonomically set. After 2 mins of cutting meat it becomes uncomfortable on the knuckle of my thumb, this is on both hands. I'd recommend these for it's efficientcy not necessarily for its comfort.
customer_reviews.author: S. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: We like wusthof knives, so it only made sense to buy their kitchen shears. Couldn't be more pleased! They are easy to clean or put in the dishwasher because they come apart. They are sharp & sturdy. They should give us many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: Boomoringa

customer_reviews.title: My favorite kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: I love these scissors, they are sharp and they break apart for washing. They are good quality, comfortable to use. This is my second pair. The first ones were fine, I just lost them. I looked at a few different pairs and I got these again because I still think they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: MYMMY

customer_reviews.title: I shopped at some of the usual suspect stores like Bed Bath and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes the shears. This was a Christmas present for my wife. I shopped at some of the usual suspect stores like Bed Bath and Beyond. They had some, but I always buy quality over price. No comparison between the made in Germany Wusthof shears vs something made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Pumper

customer_reviews.title: sharp and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I can easily cut up a raw chicken with these and I love that they come apart easily for cleaning. I don't have the problem with them coming apart during use that was mentioned in other reviews. Maybe it depends on the size and span of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Hello World

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I had hopes that it would offer adjustable tension at the hinge as I'd seen on the America's Test Kitchen segment on kitchen shears but it doesn't but its still perfectly acceptable and well made and not in China apparently, yet another very good reason to select this model.
customer_reviews.author: John Suber

customer_reviews.title: Wiife Loves Them.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. What else is there to say.
customer_reviews.author: frsLVI

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price for a great brand name!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are nice and sharp. I was worried that it may break into 2 pieces unwanted, but that never happens. Coming apart really helps with cleaning. This is a great price for a great brand name!
customer_reviews.author: Zen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Sturdy, and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Needed some replacement scissors for the ones from our block set that weren't "cutting it." These were cheap, but seem sturdy, are comfortable to use, and cut well. They also come apart easily for cleaning but never come apart when I don't want them to, which is very important.
customer_reviews.author: WMT

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof 5558-1 Come Apart Kitchen Shears
customer_reviews.text: Wusthof 5558-1 Come Apart Kitchen Shears arrived safe and sound and on the due date. I wanted equipment I could wash well and not worry about crevices when cutting meat such as chicken,. They are sharp and have worked well whenever I used them. That I can wash them well is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: RRJCRVT2912

customer_reviews.title: great shears!
customer_reviews.text: great kitchen shears... Overall, wusthof is pretty pricey.. but worth it if you have the money... I probably think twice if it wasn't on sale.. like I would go for a Victorinox/RH Forschner which I think is also good quality in terms of blade ... In this case tho, the come apart feature (with the sale price) is the selling point for me!
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Wusthof quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas from my wife to add to our Wusthof collection. They work really well. They easily come apart for easy cleaning. Very nice shears.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, cut anything with ease. Nothing more aggravating than dull scissors! These are good quality sharp scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Exact Match
customer_reviews.text: These were the exact duplicate of the ones that came with my set that I lost the shears.,
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for cutting poultry and love that they come apart for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shears
customer_reviews.text: Seems to cut everything easily so far. Works as well as my cutco, for which I paid so much more that I am reluctant to "use & abuse" it. Life-time guarantees are great, but I cannot imagine it not being a pain in the rear to return for repairs, etc. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Salsify

customer_reviews.title: good priced name brand quality
customer_reviews.text: handle well. cut well. easy grip. come apart for dishwasher. may come apart a little to easily while you're using them...it takes some getting used to not to open them up too wide when you're setting them down, or it comes apart.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeJ

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are SHARP! Like REALLY SHARP! They cut through everything I throw at em like butter. Just be careful not to open them too wide as they will seperate. Its a nice feature for cleaning them but a poor one as they pull apart quite often while using them.
customer_reviews.author: J1913

customer_reviews.title: ... needed to replace kitchen shears that had become extremely dull & had a lot of wear
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace kitchen shears that had become extremely dull & had a lot of wear. They had lasted nearly 18 years. These shears were exactly like I had before & I am very pleased with them. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Deb McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it! Seemed to be high quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas and she needed a pair badly. She really likes them and believe it or not they're still working perfectly fine. My mom cooks probably every single day so this is quite an accomplishment for any sort of kitchen utensil.
customer_reviews.author: buckeyede06

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Bought for my Henckel set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Bought for my Henckel set, I liked this brand better. And they go with my Wusthof knife block nicely
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shears
customer_reviews.text: These kitchen shears are worth the extra $$! They come apart for cleaning and are sharp enough to cut through most kitchen jobs. They're comfortable as well. Nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but when you do it a few times its really easy. So far they have stayed together while using
customer_reviews.text: A little tricky to put back together, but when you do it a few times its really easy. So far they have stayed together while using. Love they come apart for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Haase

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These shears are amazingly sharp and easy to use left or right handed. They come apart for easy cleaning but I have not had them come apart during use. You can easily cut up meat for a stew or open plastic clamshell packages. Just make sure to wash them in between.
customer_reviews.author: JA Paul

product_meta.title: Wusthof WU5558 Kitchen Shears, 8", Black
product_meta.description:
Wusthof come-a-part kitchen shears. These Wusthof come-a-part kitchen shears are good for snipping flowers, strings, cloth or herbs. The come-a-part mechanism lets you clean these scissors easily and quickly. It also prevents bacteria or rust from developing between the two halves. Standard features: Wusthof come-a-part kitchen shears length: 8"; precision forged high carbon stainless steel has a bone notch synthetic handle; hand wash; lifetime Wusthof warranty against material and manufacturing defects, with normal use and proper care; Model#: 5558-1 240613

AMAZON.COM
These powerful 8-inch kitchen shears cut food, flowers, paper, cardboard, even carpet. They're balanced in the hand and work equally well for right-handers and left-handers. Blades formed from high-carbon stainless steel curve inward so they meet in only one place at any given position and cutting action is smooth and exact. One blade's serrations prevent slippage. A plastic cap on the screw securing the blades can be lifted so the shears can be taken apart for resharpening. Steel-tooth insets in the rugged synthetic handles twist open bottle and jar caps. The shears are dishwasher-safe, but hand washing better protects the blade edges. --Fred Brack
feature_bullets: Blades come a part for easy cleaning
Can be held with either right or left hand
Can be taken apart for resharpening
Steel-tooth insets in handles twist open bottle and jar caps
